info.title: Sudo Decentralized Identity Cloud Agent SDK
info.description: Provides REST API wrappers for Typescript Agent Controllers using the Sudo Decentralized Identity Cloud Agency Service

post.summary: Close the active menu associated with a connection
Perform an action associated with the active menu
Send an action menu to a connection

get.summary: Query agent-to-agent connections

parameters.description: Create invitation from public DID (default false)

byte_count.description: Byte count of data included by reference

description.example: view from doorway, facing east, with lights off

lastmod_time.description: Hint regarding last modification datetime, in ISO-8601 format

links.description: List of hypertext links to data

kid.description: Key identifier, in W3C did:key or DID URL format

purge.description: Credential revocation ids by revocation registry id: omit for all, specify null or empty list for all pending per revocation registry

alias.description: Optional alias to apply to connection for later use

error_msg.example: No DIDDoc provided; cannot connect to public DID

inbound_connection_id.description: Inbound routing connection id to use

their_role.description: Their role in the connection protocol

imageUrl.description: Optional image URL for connection invitation

serviceEndpoint.description: Service endpoint at which to reach this agent

alias.description: Alias to assign to this connection

my_seed.description: Seed to use for the local DID

their_endpoint.description: URL endpoint for the other party

their_label.description: Label to assign to this connection

their_seed.description: Seed to use for the remote DID

value.description: Attribute value: base64-encode if MIME type is present

attrs.description: Attribute names mapped to their raw values

revoked.description: Whether credential is revoked on the ledger

schemaId.description: Schema identifier within credential definition identifier

value.description: Credential definition primary and revocation values

posture.description: Whether DID is current public DID, posted to ledger but not current public DID, or local to the wallet

endpoint_type.description: Endpoint type to set (default 'Endpoint'); affects only public or posted DIDs

restrictions.description: If present, credential must satisfy one of given restrictions: specify schema_id, schema_issuer_did, schema_name, schema_version, issuer_did, cred_def_id, and/or attr::<attribute-name>::value where <attribute-name> represents a credential attribute name

from.description: Earliest epoch of interest for non-revocation proof

to.description: Latest epoch of interest for non-revocation proof

restrictions.description: If present, credential must satisfy one of given restrictions

requested_attributes.description: Requested attribute specifications of proof request

requested_predicates.description: Requested predicate specifications of proof request

cred_id.description: Wallet credential identifier (typically but not necessarily a UUID)

revealed.description: Whether to reveal attribute in proof

timestamp.description: Epoch timestamp of interest for non-revocation proof

cred_id.description: Wallet credential identifier (typically but not necessarily a UUID)

timestamp.description: Epoch timestamp of interest for non-revocation proof

description.description: Additional descriptive text for menu form

submit-label.description: Alternative label for form submit button

description.description: Additional descriptive text for menu form parameter

errormsg.description: Optional error message to display in menu header

description.description: Additional descriptive text for menu option

disabled.description: Whether to show option as disabled

thread_id.description: Thread ID of the ping message

rrid2crid.description: Credential revocation ids by revocation registry id

imageUrl.description: Optional image URL for connection invitation

serviceEndpoint.description: Service endpoint at which to reach this agent

result.description: Number of credentials issued against revocation registry

tails_public_uri.description: Public URI to the tails file

publish.description: (True) publish revocation to ledger immediately, or (default, False) mark it pending

serviceEndpoint.description: Service endpoint at which to reach this agent

auto_remove.description: Whether to remove the credential exchange record on completion (overrides --preserve-exchange-records configuration setting)

auto_issue.description: Issuer choice to issue to request in this credential exchange

auto_offer.description: Holder choice to accept offer in this credential exchange

auto_remove.description: Issuer choice to remove this credential exchange record when complete

error_msg.example: credential definition identifier is not set in proposal

initiator.description: Issue-credential exchange initiator: self or external

raw_credential.description: Credential as received, prior to storage in holder wallet

role.description: Issue-credential exchange role: holder or issuer

trace.description: Record trace information, based on agent configuration

auto_issue.description: Whether to respond automatically to credential requests, creating and issuing requested credentials

auto_remove.description: Whether to remove the credential exchange record on completion (overrides --preserve-exchange-records configuration setting)
Whether to remove the credential exchange record on completion (overrides --preserve-exchange-records configuration setting)
Whether to remove the credential exchange record on completion (overrides --preserve-exchange-records configuration setting)

auto_present.description: Prover choice to auto-present proof as verifier requests

initiator.description: Present-proof exchange initiator: self or external

presentation_request.description: (Indy) presentation request (also known as proof request)

role.description: Present-proof exchange role: prover or verifier

trace.description: Record trace information, based on agent configuration

verified.description: Whether presentation is verified: true or false

results.description: Aries RFC 37 v1.0 presentation exchange records

auto_present.description: Whether to respond automatically to presentation requests, building and presenting requested proof

requested_attributes.description: Nested object mapping proof request attribute referents to requested-attribute specifiers

requested_predicates.description: Nested object mapping proof request predicate referents to requested-predicate specifiers

additionalProperties.description: Self-attested attribute values to use in requested-credentials structure for proof construction

self_attested_attributes.description: Self-attested attributes to build into proof
